H0.text: Which rugby union team position wears shirt number 15. Scrum-Half

H1.text: Which rugby union team position wears shirt number 15. Fly-Half

H2.text: Which rugby union team position wears shirt number 15. Centre

H3.text: Which rugby union team position wears shirt number 15. Fullback

A4.text: The scrum-half (number 9) is the link between the forwards and the backs.

A5.text: The fly-half (number 10) is usually the first player to receive the ball from the scrum-half following a breakdown, line-out or scrum.
